DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to investigate whether inactive FSH plays a role in the development of Premature Ovarian Failure in women with Classic Galactosemia
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of galactosemia through GALTactivity analysis and/or mutation analysis Premature Ovarian Failure with FSH > 30 U/l Gynecological cancers and/or unexplained vaginal bleeding
